Stats IO¶

Module to plot statistical data

port_risk.io.stats_plots.plot_correlation_matrix(corr_matrix: array, name: str, show: bool = False, save: bool = False) → None¶

Plots the input correlation matrix

Parameters:
corr_matrix: np.array

The matrix to plot.

name: str

The name of the dataset.

show: bool default False

Boolean flag set True to display to show the plot.

save: bool default False

Boolean flag set to True to save the plot.

Return:

None

port_risk.io.stats_plots.plot_histogram(data: Series, show: bool = False, save: bool = False) → None¶

Plots the histogram of the input data.

Parameters:
data: pd.Series

The data to plot.

show: bool default False

Boolean flag set True to display to show the plot.

save: bool default False

Boolean flag set to True to save the plot.

Return:

None

Plots the Q-Q plot of the input data.

data: pd.Series

The data to plot.

name: str

The name of the distribution to compare to.

func: stats.distributions

The distribution to compare to.

show: bool default False

Boolean flag set True to display to show the plot.
